summary: Completed comprehensive testing of multi-member invoice and member filtering features. All backend APIs and frontend UI components are working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Multi-member invoice and filtering features fully tested and working. Backend tests in /app/tests/test_multi_member_invoices.py cover: login, user list, multi-member invoice creation, invoice retrieval, filtered members API, Excel/CSV export. Frontend UI verified: Create Invoice dialog with multi-select checkboxes, member counter, Select All/Clear All buttons, Training Group quick select, Filter & Export Members section with By Invoice/Payment Status/Training Group filters and Download Excel button.

POST /api/invoices/.notes: Successfully creates invoices with userIds array for multiple members

GET /api/invoices/.notes: Returns invoices with userIds array showing all assigned members

GET /api/admin/members/filtered.notes: Returns filtered members without sensitive data (hashed_password, verificationToken, resetToken excluded)

GET /api/admin/members/filtered?export_f.notes: Returns Excel file with filtered members
Returns CSV file with filtered members

invoices_tab.notes: Tab navigation works, shows invoice management section

filter_export_section.notes: Filter & Export Members section visible with By Invoice, Payment Status, Training Group dropdowns and Download Excel button

invoice_table_multi_member.notes: Invoice table shows 'Tijana Isailovic, Dunja Mitic' with '2 members' label for multi-member invoices

create_invoice_dialog.notes: Dialog opens with 'Select Members (Multiple)' label, member checkboxes, counter, Select All/Clear All buttons, Training Group quick select

member_selection.notes: Checkboxes work, counter updates correctly (0→1→2), Create button shows member count

download_excel.notes: Download Excel button triggers file download (filtered_members_2026-01-04.xlsx)
